content: **crocheted octopus in drops safran or drops muskat** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ materials drops safran/muskat each cuddly toy weighs less than 50 g use remains and choose the colours you wish see pictures for suggestions drops crochet hook size 3 for safran or 3 5 for muskat accessories cotton wool for filling **pattern links ** french version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b13&d_id=27
